CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1971 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1971 Code, as supplemented through May 12, 1981, included herein. Sections of the 1971 Code, as supplemented, not listed have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances subsequently adopted, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
1971 Code
Section Section

this Code
